name: ARCHETYPE_CONSTRAINT
documentation: Archetype equivalent to LOCATABLE class in openEHR Common reference model. Defines common constraints for any inheritor of LOCATABLE in any reference model.

is_subset_of.name: is_subset_of
is_subset_of.documentation:
True if constraints represented by this node, ignoring any sub-parts, are narrower or the same as other. 
Typically used during validation of special-ised archetype nodes.

path.name: path
path.documentation: Path of this node relative to root of archetype.

has_path.name: has_path
has_path.documentation: True if the relative path a_path exists at this node.

invariants.Post: Result = soc_parent /= Void or parent.soc_parent /= Void
